title: Practitioner Competency Enhancement Program for Online Educational Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic mathematical knowledge and no online learning experience
context.additional_context: Program for In-Service Practitioners to Enhance Elementary Mathematics Instructional Design Competencies, Emphasizing Offline Collaborative Learning with Digital Devices

learning_goals: Learners can identify and explain the five core task elements for online instructional design
Learners demonstrate practical skills in adapting elementary mathematics content for online environments
Learners can propose instructional design improvements by analyzing survey data
Learners complete instructional designs applicable to real corporate environments through project-based assessment
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
